description:
Jag is
Rocco
's best friend. Rocco had such a great time, that when he came back to get blown by Race, he brought Jag with him.
Jag looks like a military dude and has the politeness that comes from military training, but he is fresh out of high school and is trying to figure out what he wants to do.
I mentioned that he and Rocco should do a scene together, at least a side-by-side jack-off, but they both were freaked by seeing their long-time friend naked. I was actually surprised that these two sport-playing jocks had not seen each other naked in the locker room or even banged a girl at the same time. They both thought I was nuts and thought that would be "too weird" ~sigh~
But there is hope, Rocco enjoyed the oral video with Race, and just after the shoot, he was egging Jag in to getting orally serviced. Jag didn't seem too sure, but thought he could stick his dick through a glory hole, but he didn't commit to anything.
I think he is hot-looking straight dude, and hope he comes back!
title: Jag - Solo
